body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Russell Torres and the customer's name is Brenda Adams.  The conversation is about a random business (a Auto Repair Shop ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I’m having some issues with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Michael. Can I have your phone number to better assist you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's five five five one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Could you also provide me with your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's nine eight seven six five four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. I’ll look into your issue right away. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for waiting, Michael. I've reset your connection. It should be working now. Can you please check?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it seems to be working now. Thank you, Alex.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! If you have any other issues, feel free to call us back. Thank you for your time.
